other_tests.findings: Normal sulcation pattern; bilateral brachydactyly of the hands; mild polyhydramnios; moderate pericardial effusion; small hydrothorax; mild retrognathia without signs of the Pierreâ€“Robin sequence; severe shortening of the ribs; high probability of pulmonary hypoplasia; protuberant abdomen; relative excess of soft tissues of the lower and upper extremities due to limb shortening.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The findings from the previous scan were generally confirmed, with additional findings noted.
